page.title: 14HEALTH IN CUMBERNAULD
page.content: My doctor's naame is Dr Kilpatrick. He works in the Health Centre at the Town Centre in Cumbernauld.{There are 4 {health centres in our town}and all our doctors work in those except when a new area is being built and then the doctor's surgery is{in one of the new {houses}until a new health centre is built. The health centres have doctor's surgeries, dentist's surgeries, treatment rooms, general purpose rooms and at the town centre there are x_ray facilities. There are also clinics for things such as expectant mothers and babies, to save them travelling to hospital. If we need to see the doctor we have to phone the health centre and make an appointment, often they are so busy they can't see you that day. If you are really unwell the dotor will come to your home.
